programme.title: After The Fight - Sambath Khun/Taylor Bonogofski
programme.sub-title: After The Fight - Sambath Khun/Taylor Bonogofski
programme.desc: Coming off of their fights at HK49, Sambath Khun and Tayler Bonogofski meet with Dr. Murray Heber to learn injury recovery and prevention techniques. Khun discusses a shoulder problem and Bonogofski gets advise on how to deal with a serious ankle issue.

programme.title: Fight Vault - HK43 - Episode 3
programme.sub-title: Fight Vault - HK43 - Episode 3
programme.desc: Hard Knocks 43 continues to bring you some of the best fights in MMA! This episode features the amateur matchup of debut Kyle Messenger vs. Patrick 'Cyborg' Leblanc. Also in his amateur debut, Nick Felber faces Tyler Kobayashi. The pro card begins with Trenton Rowell vs. former Light Heavyweight and Heavyweight Amateur Champion, Devon ""Mr. Boomtruck"" Smith. Capping this show is an exciting Light Heavyweight Title Fight between Misha Cirkunov defending his title against challenger Shaun Asher. You do not want to miss it!

programme.title: Fight Vault - HK48 - Episode 3
programme.sub-title: Fight Vault - HK48 - Episode 3
programme.desc: Hard Knocks 48 continues with more action packed MMA! We kick off this show with a great amateur fight between Dale Tallman and Chris Smeltzer. Following is the Main event of the evening, a professional Light Heavyweight Title Fight between UFC Veteran Rodney Wallace and TUF finalist Dan Spohn. You are in for five rounds of MMA action, so do not miss it!

programme.title: Fight Vault - HK48 - Episode 4
programme.sub-title: Fight Vault - HK48 - Episode 4
programme.desc: Hard Knocks 48 continues with some of the best fights in MMA! Mitch Carlson is welcomed back to HK cage by John "" The Dragon"" Nguyen in the amateur matchup of the night. Following are pros TJ Laramie, who prefers taking the fight standing, vs. Yvon ""Black Mamba"" Agenord, with a strong Jiu Jitsu background. This episode is rounded out by an entertaining pro contest between two MMA heavyweight veterans: Lee Mein vs. Lloyd Marshbanks.

programme.title: KARATE COMBAT: OLYMPUS
programme.sub-title: KARATE COMBAT: OLYMPUS
programme.desc: Live from Athens, Greece on July 28, 2018, Karate Combat: Olympus is the second event of the Karate Combat fighting league's inaugural season. Held in the ancient Zappeion Courtyard where the first modern Olympic Games took place in 1896. On the Main Card: “Hurricane” Davy Dona of France versus Jerome “The Brown Bear” from the UK. The co-main event features Morocco’s Achraf Ouchen versus Ecuadorian Franklin Mina. Other fighters include Deivis Ferraras of Dominican Republic, Wellington Barbosa of Brazil, and Yaser Sahintekin of Turkey.
